channel.title: Just a question
channel.description: So i have this server and i put a new cache, the server runs fine. I start the client client loads fine, i log into the server everything works properly but after a few seconds the client crashes. I did not add anything else to it i just swapped the cache, what makes it crash?

item.title: Just a question
item.dc:creator: @Chacaraman Chacaraman
item.description:
@Chacaraman wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:8, topic:535106”][quote author=Chacaraman link=topic=653909.msg4380518#msg4380518 date=1383360849]

Server is not crashing, your client is… If your server is… Then try it on big servers xD

yeah, thats what i meant to type, why does the client crash?

What does the CMD say?

Your client is trying to take files that your cache doesnt.

is there a way to make the cache work with the client? im using rune-evo source and client and the cache im trying to add is KingJscapes which i think its 742 with 747 indexes.
[/quote]

I personally would just try to add what you want in the cache to the Rune-Evo Client Cache… Rather than just using a different one…[/quote]

i want to do that but when i try i fail

Read full topic

item.title: Just a question
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Chacaraman, post:7, topic:535106”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=653909.msg4380515#msg4380515 date=1383360642]

Server is not crashing, your client is… If your server is… Then try it on big servers xD

yeah, thats what i meant to type, why does the client crash?

What does the CMD say?

Your client is trying to take files that your cache doesnt.
[/quote]

is there a way to make the cache work with the client? im using rune-evo source and client and the cache im trying to add is KingJscapes which i think its 742 with 747 indexes.[/quote]

I personally would just try to add what you want in the cache to the Rune-Evo Client Cache… Rather than just using a different one…

Read full topic
